timeline.bodyText:
The commit message is pretty pale.
Please mention why the downgrade and why the version 4.0.0.
Also, mention how the problem manifests so that we can retest in the future.
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: Once we verify that this is the real solution for the problem, we need to downgrade this in airbase too.
replies.author: kokosing

timeline.message:
Downgrade git-commit-id to 4.0.0

git-commit-id was upgraded in airbase in https://github.com/airlift/airbase/commit/9917d82968133efa6f69e51efcd2e114031e29ae
and in PrestoSQL in https://github.com/prestosql/presto/commit/84ed87a90a0192a3d81db913b6e1c3b9e36e0c0c.

4.0.2 seems to cause problems when building project locally that manifest with:

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal pl.project13.maven:git-commit-id-plugin:4.0.2:revision (default) on project presto-spi: Could not complete Mojo execution... Task java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$AsyncSupply@78e305f1 rejected from java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor@67cff96d[Running, pool size = 5, active threads = 5, queued tasks = 0, completed tasks = 0] -> [Help 1]

Downgrade git-commit-id to 4.0.0

git-commit-id was upgraded in airbase in https://github.com/airlift/airbase/commit/9917d82968133efa6f69e51efcd2e114031e29ae
and in PrestoSQL in https://github.com/prestosql/presto/commit/84ed87a90a0192a3d81db913b6e1c3b9e36e0c0c.

4.0.2 seems to cause problems when building project locally that manifest with:

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal pl.project13.maven:git-commit-id-plugin:4.0.2:revision (default) on project presto-spi: Could not complete Mojo execution... Task java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$AsyncSupply@78e305f1 rejected from java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor@67cff96d[Running, pool size = 5, active threads = 5, queued tasks = 0, completed tasks = 0] -> [Help 1]
